snippet: In a small village in Provence, the storied custom-rug maker Cogolin brings the magical designs of a Modernist artist back to life....
abstract: Storied French custom-rug maker Cogolin plans to launch collection called Idylle, based on 1930s-era Modernist paintings.
lead_paragraph: In a small village in Provence, the storied custom-rug maker Cogolin brings the magical designs of a Modernist artist back to life.

headline.main: A Historically Minded Collection of Carpets
